data.title: This is listed wrong
data.text: Palm Hill Country Club is a mobile home park with a PRIVATE golf course. You have to live here to use the facilities.  It is a wonderful place to live and it's a great little course with very tricky greens.

data.title: clean mobile park
data.text: It is a nice and clean 55 or older mobile home park in Florida.  It has a nice golf range, good size pool, a good size meeting place. They offer a lot of activities.  It has an area for pets as well.  When visiting it is a nice experience.

data.title: Very comfortable lifestyle
data.text: We have been at Palm Hill for 8 years, alternating between FL and PA, and have enjoyed every monent there.  Very nice people, close to everything and the beach.  Wouldn't change location for anyplace in Largo.

data.title: Great Place to live and play.
data.text: Like one big family watching out for each other. More activities that anyone could possibly do. A great golf course with very challenging sand traps. Fun to play. Pools, shuffleboard, tennis courts. bocci courts, and 2 clubhouses for activities.
